title: About Me
info: I'm from the beautiful island in the Caribbean: Dominican Republic. I'm passionate about its culture and specially food! With not a lot of income, my parents got a PC when I was young; I built my first game in a GameMaker engine for Windows Xp when I was around 12 and I loved it! I've loved to develop usufel tools and systems, manage projects and work hard until I get the job done.

title: SR2
info: Samir Emmanuel Rodriguez Rodriguez... Yes! 2 Rodriguez-es... hence the SR2.
info2: This is my dream Software Development company. For now, I'm just free-lancing and getting experience everywhere I go.
